creator: dan@dantanner.com
text:
There seems to be a problem with the log4j.dtd file when initially parsing an 
XML config file.  I've been able to use a Properties file type configuration 
without any problems, but to use asynchronous appending, I can only use an XML 
config file.

I'm not experienced in DTD configuration, but one glaring possibility that 
comes to mind in my environment is that I'm using the latest JAXP 1.1 reference 
impl from Sun. (jaxp.jar, crimson.jar, xalan.jar).

Here's the actual error message:
